effect.Name: Vivid Light
effect.description: Vivid Light - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Burns or dodges the colors by increasing or decreasing the contrast, depending on the blend color. If the blend color (light source) is lighter than 50% gray, the image is lightened by decreasing the contrast. If the blend color is darker than 50% gray, the image is darkened by increasing the contrast
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Vivid Light (Background) Shader | 1.1 (24.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Burns or dodges the colors by increasing or decreasing the contrast, depending on the blend color. If the blend color (light source) is lighter than 50% gray, the image is lightened by decreasing the contrast. If the blend color is darker than 50% gray, the image is darkened by increasing the contrast

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
